name: Let the Games Begin
description:
Welcome to the Thumbs Project, a weekly short Interactive Fiction project I'm working on, releasing a new game based off of the title of an episode of the Idle Thumbs Podcast.

Today's project was Episode 1: Let the Games Begin. From Idle Thumbs:

Throw away your bifocals and burn your books. Why rely on reading comprehension when you can sit on your ass and listen to us talk? Idle Thumbs is back, now with 100% fewer articles, and we've been hitting the preview events just for you.
